about.aboutBroadwayText1: Broadway Corporation was founded with a clear vision: to create sustainable development solutions that bridge the gap between innovative science and practical implementation.
about.aboutBroadwayText2: Operating from our strategic hub in the United States while maintaining strong operational presence in Cameroon, we bring together diverse expertise through our two main divisions: Broadway Enterprise and Broadway Farmhouse.
about.aboutBroadwayText3: Our united approach enables us to tackle complex challenges in education, agriculture, and community development with comprehensive, sustainable solutions.
about.missionText: To foster sustainable development through the innovative application of science, education, and agriculture, creating lasting positive impact in communities.

about.value2: Sustainability: Ensuring our work creates lasting positive impact

ceoMessage.metaDescription: Read the welcome message from Ngu Teboh Gustave, Founder and CEO of Broadway Corporation.
ceoMessage.heroTagline: A message about our mission, vision, and commitment to sustainable development.
ceoMessage.quote: We believe that sustainable development isn't just a goal; it's our responsibility. We're building a resilient, knowledge-driven future for Africa and beyond.
ceoMessage.greeting: As the CEO and General Manager of Broadway Corporation, I am proud to lead a dynamic holding company committed to driving sustainable development through innovation in science, education, agriculture, and community advancement.
ceoMessage.paragraph1: Our three divisions—Broadway Enterprise, Broadway Farmhouse, and Broadway Corporation—are united by a common vision: to empower communities, foster growth, and create lasting impact across Cameroon. Through Broadway Enterprise, we strengthen educational and scientific infrastructure; through Broadway Farmhouse, we champion sustainable farming and food security.
ceoMessage.paragraph2: I believe in hard work, creativity, and unwavering attention to detail. I am strict because I care deeply about excellence—and I take great pride in helping others grow and succeed. At Broadway Corporation, we don't just talk about change; we build it.
ceoMessage.paragraph3: To our youth: your future begins with the choices you make today. Be hardworking, act with integrity, and most importantly—learn to follow instructions. Discipline and humility are keys to success. And above all, stay resilient against the temptation of corruption. It is a silent worm that eats away our human dignity and destroys the foundations of a better future.
ceoMessage.paragraph4: Let's keep growing, innovating, and building a stronger, brighter tomorrow together.
ceoMessage.closing:
— Teboh Gustave, Ngu
CEO & General Manager
Broadway Corporation
ceoMessage.portraitAlt: Teboh Gustave, Ngu - CEO and General Manager of Broadway Corporation

case1.title: STEM Laboratory Program for Secondary Schools
case1.description: We designed and built fully equipped science laboratories for three secondary schools in Yaoundé, providing modern equipment and comprehensive training for teachers to enhance STEM education capabilities.
case1.results: Improved practical science education for over 1,500 students annually, with a 40% increase in student performance in science subjects and growing interest in STEM careers.

case2.title: Community Science Education Initiative
case2.description: We implemented a community-based science education program in rural Bamenda, establishing a mobile science laboratory and training local educators to bring hands-on science learning to underserved areas.
case2.results: Reached over 2,000 students across 12 rural communities, provided training for 24 local educators, and established sustainable science education infrastructure that continues to serve the region.

case1.title: Integrated Farming System for Small-Scale Farmers
case1.description: We developed and implemented an integrated farming system that combines crop production, livestock raising, and fish farming for small-scale farmers in the Bamenda region, including training on sustainable practices.
case1.results: Increased farm productivity by 60% for participating farmers, with a 45% increase in household income and improved food security for over 100 families.

case2.title: Coastal Aquaculture Development Project
case2.description: We established a sustainable coastal aquaculture operation in Limbe focused on tilapia and catfish production, with a training component for local fishermen transitioning to aquaculture.
case2.results: Created 30 full-time jobs and produced over 15 tons of fish annually, while training 50 local fishermen in sustainable aquaculture practices.
